item.title: Where to Buy a Used or Refurbished Chromebook in the US?
item.description: This page lists places where US based customers can find used and refurbished Chromebooks online or offline.

item.title: How to Create a Bootable USB Drive on Linux?
item.description: A brief tutorial on how to create a bootable USB thumb drive on a Linux system using the commands df and dd.

item.title: What's the Best Linux Distro for a Netbook?
item.description: The short answer is that there is no single best Linux distro for a netbook. But not all hope is lost, you can find an answer for your specific use case.
